parse.title: Musical chapters from The Lord of the Rings

wikitext.*:
{{Incomplete}}

'''Musical chapters from The Lord of the Rings''' is a Opera based on the [[The Lord of the Rings]] and composed by [[Paul Corfield Godfrey]]

==List of Tracks or "Chapters"==

*'''"Part 1: The Shadow of the Past"'''
**'"A Long-Expected Party" - 35 minutes  
**"The Return of the Shadow" - 45 minutes  
**"Tom Bombadil" - 38 minutes  
**"The Prancing Pony" - 25 minutes  
**"Flight to the Ford" - 30 minutes
*'''"Part 2: The Ring Goes South"'''  
**"The Council of Elrond" - 54 minutes  
**"Farewell to Rivendell" - 23 minutes  
**"A Journey in the Dark" - 23 minutes  
**"The Mirror of Galadriel" - 49 minutes  
**"The Breaking of the Fellowship" - 23 minutes
*'''"Part 3: The Treason of Isengard"'''  
**"The Plains and the Forest" - 33 minutes  
**"The Riders of Rohan" - 32 minutes  
**"The King of the Golden Hall" - 31 minutes  
**"The Journey to Isengard" - 34 minutes  
**"The Voice of Saruman" - 29 minutes
*'''"Part 4: The Ring Goes East"'''  
**"The Black Gate is Closed" - 37 minutes  
**"The Window on the West" - 39 minutes  
**"Cirith Ungol" - 36 minutes
*'''"Part 5: The War of the Ring"'''  
**"Minas Tirith" - 22 minutes  
**"The Passing of the Grey Company" - 32 minutes  
**"The Siege of Gondor" - 26 minutes  
**"Pelennor Fields" - 29 minutes  
**"The Houses of Healing" - 35 minutes  
**"The Black Gate Opens" - 13 minutes
*'''"Part 6: The End of the Third Age"'''  
**"Mount Doom" - 45 minutes  
**"The Field of Cormallen" - 26 minutes  
**"The Steward and the King" - 30 minutes  
**"Homeward Bound" - 31 minutes  
**"The Scouring of the Shire" - 24 minutes  
**"The Grey Havens" - 35 minutes
*'''"Appendices"'''  ''additional or cut material from the "musical chapters"''  
**Appendix I: "The Lay of Luthien"  
**Appendix II: "The Lay of Earendil"  
**Appendix III: "The Lay of Durin"  
**Appendix IV: "Epilogue: Aragorn and Arwen"

==Cast Members==
For list of Cast members see https://www.volanteopera.wales/lordoftherings
